# HMPresenceEventType.everyExit

**Case**

Triggers the event every time a user leaves the home.

## Declaration

```swift
case everyExit
```

## Discussion

This presence type cannot be used as a predicate.

## Specifying presence type

- **HMPresenceEventType.everyEntry**: Triggers the event every time a user enters the home.
- **HMPresenceEventType.firstEntry**: Triggers an event for the first user entering the home.
- **HMPresenceEventType.lastExit**: Triggers an event when the last user leaves the home.
